content:
I want to stabilize https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/69821.

Does that need some kind of stabilization report or can I just open a PR changing the attributes?
AFAIK you open a PR, write a stabilization report in there, and then someone needs to kick off T-lang + T-libs FCP (I think it's both teams for const intrinsics, not sure though)
Opened https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73395, will try and write the stabilization report later today
hm, similar PRs don't have a stabilization report and I don't really know what it should contain, let's just hope it isn't needed :shrug:
